info.title: Ninja RMM Public API 2.0
info.description:
Ninja RMM Public API documentation.

See also:
Device Filter syntax
Webhooks

get.description: Returns list of organizations (Brief mode)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Limit number of organizations to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Last Organization Identifier from previous page

post.description:
Creates new organization with optional list of locations and policy mappings.
Template organization ID can be specified to copy various settings

schema.description: Model/Template organization to copy settings from

policyId.description: Policy Identifier

put.description: Creates or updates Webhook configuration for current application/client

delete.description: Creates or updates PSA configuration based on client

post.description: Approve or reject devices that are waiting for approval

post.summary: Reset alert/condition and provide custom data for activity

get.summary: Get list of ticket log entries
get.description: Get list of ticket log entries
Returns attachment (image, document)
Returns device details

Returns link to device

delete.description: Submit request to remove device policy overrides

get.description: Returns scripting options (built-in actions, custom scripts) available for device

post.description: Start/Stop/Restart Windows Service on a device
Sends a command to restart the computer

disabledFeatures.description: List of features that will be disabled during maintenance

items.description: List of features that will be disabled during maintenance

start.description: Maintenance window start (optional, defaults to now)

delete.description: Cancel pending or active maintenance for device

parameters.description: Additional information to include (bl - BitLocker status)

protectionStatus.description: indicates whether the volume and its encryption key (if any) are secured.

lockStatus.description: Indicates whether the contents of the volume are accessible from Windows
